name: Pac-Man VS
description:
PAC-MAN VS.

As the title suggests, this is the classic Pac-Man but with versus multiplayer, for up to 5 players.

GET THE OBJECTIVE SCORE!

PAC-MAN
Go and munch every pellet of the maze, but beware the ghosts, one touch and you are done for... however, if you eat a power pellet, the tables will turn for a while, use them on a tight situation.

GHOST
Cannot turn back, can't see much of the map, can't stop moving and can't munch pellets... so you wont be allowed to obtain points easily, but you can catch Pac-Man wich gives you lots of points and lets you become Pac-Man next round, you can also see other ghosts location, so you can sparse in the search of Pac-Man or try to flank him, but remember that only the one who catches Pac-Man will become Pac-Man.

Oh yeah, fruit, each time Pac-man eats a fourth of the amount of pellets in the maze a fruit will appear on a specific part of the maze, wich either player can eat and get many points, if you are a ghost, it will improve your vision range for a while.

~Specs

That is my computer, the one in which I made the game.

~Installation
Just extract the file using an application such as WinRAR.

~Connect
The game uses direct IP connection, some people may have to port foward (Port: 6121) in order to host a game over internet, I recommend you checking a tutorial if you have any problems, or use an alternative such as HAMACHI to connect without any problem.

Current build: 300920
Development still in progress.
